title: test user registration and login
description: Verify that the user can successfully register with email and password, receive a JWT token, and log in with valid credentials.

title: test mood detection via face
description: Verify that the system can detect user mood accurately from facial images using the DeepFace ensemble models with at least 30% confidence threshold.

title: test mood detection via text
description: Verify that the system can detect user mood accurately from text input using combined VADER, TextBlob, and keyword matching sentiment analysis.

title: test fetching spotify playlists by mood
description: Verify that the system fetches at least 20 relevant Spotify playlists based on the detected mood with correct metadata.

title: test fetching youtube playlists by mood
description: Verify that the system fetches at least 20 relevant YouTube playlists based on the detected mood with correct metadata.

title: test saving and retrieving favorite playlists
description: Verify that users can save playlists to favorites, retrieve them, filter, and remove favorites without duplicates.

title: test mood history logging and retrieval
description: Verify that mood detection entries are correctly logged with timestamp and detection method and can be retrieved and displayed in chronological order.

title: test updating user preferences
description: Verify that users can update their preferences for platform (Spotify/YouTube/both) and theme, and the changes persist.

title: test secure session management
description: Verify that JWT-based sessions are managed securely via cookies with a 7-day expiration and proper logout functionality.

title: test error handling for api calls
description: Verify that the system handles errors gracefully for all API calls including network errors, invalid inputs, and API rate limits with appropriate user feedback.
